statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT post_id, user_id, platform FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM social_media_data WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT user_id, post_content, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM social_media_data ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT post_id, platform, post_content FROM social_media_data WHERE user_id = 1234
SELECT count(*) FROM social_media_data WHERE platform = 'Twitter'
SELECT * FROM social_media_data ORDER BY post_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT post_id, user_id, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8
SELECT post_id, user_id, platform FROM social_media_data WHERE post_content LIKE '%happy%'
SELECT * FROM social_media_data
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score, post_content FROM social_media_data
SELECT platform_name, post_content FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT post_id, platform_name FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2
SELECT * FROM trend_prediction
SELECT post_id, post_content, platform_name, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data WHERE platform_name = 'Twitter';
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM social_media_data ORDER BY post_id DESC;
SELECT platform_name, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment FROM social_media_data GROUP BY platform_name;
SELECT post_id, post_content, platform_name, sentiment_score FROM social_media_data JOIN trend_prediction ON sentiment_score = confidence_score;
SELECT post_id, post_content, platform_name FROM social_media_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts ORDER BY post_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT platform, post_content FROM social_media_posts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT post_id, platform, post_content FROM social_media_posts WHERE platform = 'Twitter'
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts WHERE sentiment_score < 0.0
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score FROM social_media_posts WHERE platform = 'Instagram'
SELECT post_id, platform, post_content, sentiment_score FROM social_media_posts WHERE platform = 'Twitter' ORDER BY post_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY platform ASC, post_id DESC
SELECT post_content, sentiment_score FROM social_media_posts WHERE platform = 'Facebook' OR platform = 'Instagram' LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5
SELECT platform, COUNT(post_id) AS total_posts FROM social_media_posts GROUP BY platform HAVING COUNT(post_id) >= 5 ORDER BY total_posts DESC
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment_score, MIN(sentiment_score) AS min_sentiment_score, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_sentiment_score FROM social_media_posts
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT user_id, post FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT platform_name, founded_date FROM social_media_platform WHERE founded_date >= '2020-01-01';
SELECT trend_name, prediction_score FROM trend_prediction ORDER BY prediction_score DESC;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM user_profile WHERE followers_count < 1000;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(post) AS post_count FROM sentiment_analysis GROUP BY user_id HAVING post_count > 5 ORDER BY post_count DESC;
SELECT u.username, t.trend_name FROM user_profile u JOIN trend_prediction t ON u.user_id = t.id WHERE u.followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY u.followers_count DESC;

SELECT platform_name, COUNT(*) AS trend_count FROM trend_prediction JOIN social_media_platform ON trend_prediction.hashtag = social_media_platform.platform_name GROUP BY platform_name HAVING trend_count > 2 ORDER BY trend_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_posts;
SELECT post_id, post_content, sentiment_score FROM social_media_posts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY account_created_at DESC;
SELECT post_content, post_date FROM social_media_posts WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT hashtag_name, COUNT(*) AS count FROM hashtags GROUP BY hashtag_name HAVING count > 5;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' ORDER BY account_created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT post_id, post_content, sentiment_score FROM social_media_posts WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY post_date ASC;
SELECT username, email, account_created_at FROM users INNER JOIN comments ON users.user_id = comments.user_id ORDER BY comments.comment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT prediction_id, trend_name, prediction_date FROM trend_predictions WHERE prediction_score < 0.3 ORDER BY trend_name ASC;

SELECT hashtag_name, COUNT(post_id) AS post_count FROM hashtags LEFT JOIN social_media_posts ON hashtags.hashtag_id = social_media_posts.post_id GROUP BY hashtag_name ORDER BY post_count DESC LIMIT 3;
